text: Gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim itim, a nguibam inisɨ tuavir aghuim mɨdorozir gumazibar akagham. Eghtɨ gumaziba kamagh mɨkɨmam, nguibamɨn dɨvazim bar gavgavizɨ, apaniba anekaran iburagham. Eghtɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba mangɨ mɨsoghɨva, nguibamɨn mɨdorozir gumazir gavgaviba dɨkabɨraghɨva, nguibam iniva dɨvazir kam gasɨghasigham.
